message: Wondering if the group has thoughts on online services to handle email mailing lists. Looked at MailChimp and constant contact so far. I don't want to run it myself as I need to get something in place yesterday. Thoughts?
I evaluated MailChimp last year for a client. I thought it was a very well-designed service.
I really like Newsberry (http://newsberry.com/). I haven't used I manage one email list with it and it works very well. Love the site design too.

I liked this comparison from last year: http://groundwire.org/files/email-service-provider-comparison-report-2010 , and here's a rough price comparison from last year: http://www.karelia.com/mac_indie_marketing/comparison-bulk-email-marketing.html
We've been using MailChimp for a while, works for us.
